Text: Side Platform 1x1
A platform that can be placed on the side of cliffs, levees, reinforced platforms, or platform middle pieces.
Imagine if you could stack these on top of each other.
Side Platform 2x1
A platform that can be placed on the side of cliffs, reinforced platforms, or platform middle pieces.
Double the platforms, double the fun!

A platform that can be placed on the side of cliffs, reinforced platforms or platform middle pieces.
This is for the looooooong boys.
Side Platform 4x1
A platform that can be placed on the side of cliffs, reinforced platforms, or platform middle pieces.

Side Platform Middle Piece 1 High
A platform that can be placed anywhere. Let your creativity loose!
Let's build a floating city!

A platform that can be placed anywhere. Let your creativity run wild!
For when one high is just not enough.
Reinforced Ladder
It is a ladder that can also be used in combination with the Side Platforms. It serves as a more aesthetically pleasing option than levees.
When a normal ladder isn't enough.
